summary: A mod which allows the blacksmiths of Skyrim to continue selling and buying goods from anywhere once they've become a follower. *WIP*
descriptionHtml:
Credit to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/7935072]Overkill55[/url] for the request/idea.

NOTE: do not download this mod for use in game. This is available as a jumping off point for someone else who thinks they can make it work.

Requested mod: It currently has some major bugs which I can't figure out when I'm this tired. Namely, everything works perfectly fine... sometimes... and for some people. It doesn't work the rest of the time or for other people. Don't get this just yet. But if it appeals to you, I should have a working version up within a day or two (possibly sooner). If you think you can fix it, then go [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1188613-in-search-of-blacksmith-follower/]here[/url] to see what's wrong with it. If you fix it, then upload it, let me know, give me some credit (please?) and I'll just remove this one. Or I'll replace this with yours and give you credit. Whatever works for you.

What it actually does: This mod adds a faction to each vanilla Blacksmith merchant. The new factions makes it so if that blacksmith is a follower, then they'll offer their services anytime, anywhere. The point is so that if you make a blacksmith a follower, then you can trade with them wherever they go.
author: Xander9009
